title: PeaNUT LXC
textContent:
PeaNUT LXC 
                PeaNUT
                    is a
                    Tiny Dashboard for Network UPS Tools.
                ðŸ›ˆ configure the files in /etc/nut then update the PeaNUT
                    service
                    environment variables in /etc/systemd/system/peanut.service.
                
                To create a new Proxmox VE PeaNUT LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                    To Update PeaNUT, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/peanut.sh)"
                âš¡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU âš¡
                PeaNUT Interface: IP:3000
outerHTML:
PeaNUT LXC

PeaNUT is a Tiny Dashboard for Network UPS Tools.

ðŸ›ˆ configure the files in /etc/nut then update the PeaNUT service environment variables in /etc/systemd/system/peanut.service.

To create a new Proxmox VE PeaNUT LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update PeaNUT, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/peanut.sh)"

âš¡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU âš¡

PeaNUT Interface: IP:3000
